text: is a Japanese cross-country skier. She competed at the 1998 Winter Olympics and the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Japan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Akita Prefecture Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1999 Asian Winter Games
title: Midori Furusawa
